verses.roman:
atha pañca-guṇā ye syur
aṁśena giriśādiṣu

synonyms: atha—now(over and above these); pañca-guṇāḥ—five qualities; ye—which; syuḥ—may exist; aṁśena—by part; giriśa-ādiṣu—in demigods like Lord Śiva.
translation: " 'Apart from these fifty qualities, there are five other qualities found in the Supreme Personality of Godhead that are partially present in demigods like Śiva.

purport.content: This verse and the following seven verses are also found in the Bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhu (2.1.37-44).
